citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30-2:00pm
on 05-MAR-20.
Inspectors attempted to make contact at the home and the facility. Inspectors called the number on file and left a
voice mail. Inspectors waited 30 minutes and left a leave behind flyer in the door prior to departing the facility.
Additional/Updated Optimal Hours have been requested.
Additional Inspectors
Padden Andrew, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30-2:00pm
on 05-MAR-20.
Inspectors attempted to make contact at the home and the facility.  Inspectors called the number on file and left a
voice mail.  Inspectors waited 30 minutes and left a leave behind flyer in the door prior to departing the facility. 
Additional/Updated Optimal Hours have been requested.
Additional Inspectors
Padden Andrew, Veterinary Medical Officer
